::Zardus/Kluster::

Zardus shakes his head. "No questions. Please proceed."

Zardus looks around the room. This was not a ship to mess with, he decides as 
he follows Panzertron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster grins. "Its a great ship. This is actually its first mission. Other 
than the engines, it's fully functional."

They reach the entrance, the hatch opening for them. Kluster looks at Phobia.

"For security reasons, you'll be fully monitored by the scanners while you're 
inside. If you act fine, nothing'll happen."

Kluster turns a corner. "The conference room is this way."
